refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a data tip on a polyline by program

listitem.para: The index of a polyline data point where to draw the data tip.
A vector with 2 elements, the coordinates of the point where to draw the data tip.
The handle on the newly created entity

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function can be used to create data tips on a polyline by program. Called with an index as second argument, it sets the tip at the coordinates given by polyline point specified by the index. Called with a point as second argument it sets the tip at the coordinates corresponding to the orthogonal projection of the point on the polyline if the interpolation mode is on or to the nearest mesh point.
